welcome_home: Welcome to Aftrip, your one-stop destination for discovering and booking the best travel and craft experiences in Madagascar.
button_home_accommodation: Explore a wide selection of carefully chosen hotels to meet all your needs, from luxury stays to budget getaways. Book with confidence using an intuitive and secure reservation system.
button_home_handcraft: Dive into local craftsmanship by discovering unique and authentic products. Order exceptional pieces directly from the platform.
button_home_tour: Plan your adventures with our partner tour operators, experts in organizing memorable trips. Find and book your next experience with ease.
welcome_login: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
we_sent_a_verification_PIN: We sent a verification PIN code to
paste_the_PIN_Code_you: Paste the PIN code you received in the mail below.
no_worries_we_ll: No worries, we’ll send you reset instructions.
your_new_password_must: Your new password must be different from the previously used passwords.
must_uppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase character
must_lowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase character
must_number: Must contain at least one number
must_special: Must contain at least one special character
helping_you_find_the_best: Helping you to find the best comfortable place.
find_your_best_accommodation_on: Find your best accommodation on Aftrip
handcraft_header_title: Immerse yourself in a world where art and tradition meet on Aftrip.
explore_handcraft_categorie_label: Let yourself be seduced by the richness and diversity of the handicraft products that offer you, 100% made in Madagascar. Discover our different categories and find treasures that tell a story and add a touch of authenticity to your daily life.
dont_wait_until_tomorrow_handcraft: Don’t wait until tomorrow! Discover your adventure now and feel the sensation of closeness to nature around you here in Madagascar. To get the best adventure you just need to leave and go where you like.
home_made_customized_label: Discover some of the most unique and fulfilling experiences your next destination has to offer. Providing the best.
cheap_price_label: Discover some of the most unique and fulfilling experiences your next destination has to offer. Providing the best.
memorable_souvenir_label: Discover some of the most unique and fulfilling experiences your next destination has to offer. Providing the best.
dont_wait_to_discover_handcraft: Don’t wait until tomorrow! Discover your adventure now and feel the sensation of closeness to nature around you here in Madagascar. To get the best adventure you just need to leave and go where you like.
tour_header_title: Find your best trip expedition in Madagascar with operator tour on Aftrip.
dont_wait_tommorow_tour: Don’t wait until tomorrow! Discover your adventure now and feel the sensation of closeness to nature around you here in Madagascar. To get the best adventure you just need to leave and go where you like.
dont_wait_until_tommorow_discover_tour: Don’t wait until tomorrow! Discover your adventure now and feel the sensation of closeness to nature around you here in Madagascar. To get the best adventure you just need to leave and go where you like.
discover_some_unique_trip: Discover some of the most unique and fulfilling experiences your next destination has to offer. Providing the best.
discover_explore_save: Discover some of the most unique and fulfilling experiences your next destination has to offer. Providing the best.
discover_enjoy_trip: Discover some of the most unique and fulfilling experiences your next destination has to offer. Providing the best.
popular_trip_moment_label: Don’t wait until tomorrow! Discover your adventure now and feel the sensation of closeness to nature around you here in Madagascar. To get the best adventure you just need to leave and go where you like.
discover_and_enjoy_group_trip: Discover and enjoy a group trip.
join_on_group_expedition: Join us on a group expedition that promises unforgettable experiences, breathtaking landscapes, and camaraderie like never before. Whether you’re an avid explorer or a curious traveler, our expeditions are designed to ignite your sense of wonder and discovery.
aboutAftripTxt: Aftrip is a tourist destination platform for those seeking authentic and responsible experiences, aiming to promote the cultural richness of each region, facilitating the discovery of hidden treasures, whether unique hotels, exceptional artisanal products or trips organized by local experts.
ourMissionP: Our mission is to transform every trip into an unforgettable experience. To do this, we are committed to :
facilitateText: Providing a simple and intuitive platform for every traveler to explore and book the best tourism experiences in Madagascar
guaranteeText: Ensure that every reservation and purchase provides a deep immersion in culture and traditions
supportLocalText: Promote local artisans, hotels, and tour operators by offering them a global showcase for their products and services
ensureSecurityText: Integrate cutting-edge technologies to ensure secure transactions and reliable bookings
collaborate: Collaborate with Aftrip in a few simple steps
collaborateP: Become a potential Aftrip partner and increase your income by following a few steps
registerEstaText: Create your account, access the collaboration form and add your establishment details. Once the form is completed, submit it for verification. Our team will ensure that all information meets our quality criteria
manageAccountText: Once approved, your property will be posted online and accessible to the thousands of travelers using Aftrip to plan their trips. Use your personal space to update your information, add new offers or promotions, and track your reservations.
monetizeText: Generate your direct revenue through your service offers and receive your payments directly via the platform. You can also track your revenue and offer performance from your dashboard
faqP: See the most requested information on the platform
question1: How can I book a hotel or tour on Aftrip ?
reponse1: You can easily book a hotel or tour by browsing our categories and selecting the option that best suits you, or by searching for them specifically from the search box. Once you have made your choice, follow the steps to complete the reservation.
question2: What types of craft products can I purchase through Aftrip ?
reponse2: Aftrip offers a wide range of authentic artisanal products from different regions. You can buy jewelry, pottery, basketry and much more, directly from local artisans
question3: How do I add my establishment (hotel, craft shop, tour operator service) to Aftrip ?
reponse3: To add your establishment to Aftrip, create an account and access your personal space. Complete the collaboration form providing all the necessary details about your establishment, then submit it for approval by our team.
question4: What payment methods are accepted on the platform ?
reponse4: We accept multiple payment methods, including Stripe, Visa, MasterCard or American Express. All transactions are secure to ensure your peace of mind.
question5: How can I track my order or booking status ?
reponse5: You can track the status of your orders and bookings directly from your Aftrip account. Simply log in, go to the history section, and you'll find real-time updates on your purchases and booking
question6: Is there customer support available if I need help ?
reponse6: Yes, Aftrip offers 24/7 customer support to assist you with any questions or issues you may encounter. You can reach out to us via live chat, and our team will be happy to help.
reponse7: Aftrip's cancellation policy varies depending on the service provider (hotel, artisan, tour operator). You can find specific cancellation terms in the booking or order details. Please review these before completing your transaction to avoid any misunderstandings.
question8: Can I leave a review for a hotel, product, or tour I booked ?
reponse8: Absolutely! We encourage you to leave reviews for the hotels, products, and tours you’ve experienced through Aftrip. Your feedback not only helps other travelers but also allows our partners to improve their services.
FAQIntro: Welcome to Aftrip's Frequently Asked Questions page! Here we have collected answers to the most common questions about our platform. Whether you are a visitor, a host, a craft seller, or a tour operator, you will find the information you need to make the best use of Aftrip
FAQIntro2: If you cannot find the answer to your question, do not hesitate to contact us via our contact form. We are here to help you make the most of your experience on Aftrip!
faqtxt1: Aftrip is a tourism referencing platform which brings together reservation services in terms of accommodation, sale of crafts and reservation of trips organized by tour operators in Madagascar.
faq2: How can I book accommodation or a tour on Aftrip?
faqtxt2: You can easily book accommodation or a tour by browsing our categories and selecting the option that suits you best, or by searching for them specifically from the search box. Once you have made your choice, follow the steps to complete the reservation
faq3: How can I buy artisanal products on Aftrip?
faqtxt3: Browse our "Crafts" section, add the desired products to your basket, then proceed to secure payment.
faq4: What types of trips are available on Aftrip?
faqtxt4: Aftrip offers trips organized by tour operators, including excursions, tourist circuits, and thematic stays.
faq5: How can I create an account on Aftrip?
faqtxt5: Click on "Register", fill out the form with your personal information, and validate your registration.
faq6: Can I cancel or modify a booking?
faqtxt6: Yes, you can cancel or modify a booking under certain conditions, detailed in our cancellation policy and those of the establishments exhibiting their services on the platform.
faq7: What payment methods are accepted on Aftrip?
faqtxt7: We accept multiple payment methods, including Stripe, Visa, MasterCard or American Express. All transactions are secure to ensure your peace of mind.
faq8: Can I contact an accommodation or tour operator directly before booking?
faqtxt8: Yes, Aftrip offers the possibility of contacting establishments or tour operators via our platform before confirming a reservation.
faq9: How can I add my accommodation, craft store or tour operator service to Aftrip?
faqtxt9: You must create a business account, then fill out a detailed form to add your services to Aftrip.
faq10: What are the costs for listing my establishment or service on Aftrip?
faqtxt10: Registration of establishments and services is free, subject to a certain condition during the integration procedure.
faq11: How are reviews managed on Aftrip?
faqtxt11: Reviews left by customers are verified and must comply with our publication policy before being visible on the site.
faq12: Can I get an invoice for my purchases or reservations on Aftrip?
faqtxt12: Yes, an invoice is automatically generated and sent to your email address after each transaction.
faq13: How can I track the status of my order or reservation?
faqtxt13: You can track the status of your orders and reservations directly from your Aftrip account. Simply log in, go to the history section and you will find real-time updates on your purchases and bookings.
faq14: How can I be sure of the quality of the handmade products purchased?
faqtxt14: Artisanal products on Aftrip are carefully selected and sellers are evaluated regularly to guarantee quality.
faq15: Est-ce que les prix affichés sur Aftrip incluent les taxes et les frais de service ?
faqtxt15: Yes, all prices shown include taxes and service charges for complete transparency.
faq16: What languages ​​are supported by the Aftrip platform?
faqtxt16: Aftrip is available in French and English
faq17: Can I change my personal information after creating my account?
faqtxt17: Yes, you can modify your personal information at any time from your member area.
faq18: What types of artisanal products are offered on Aftrip?
faqtxt18: You will find a wide range of artisan products, including decorative objects, jewelry, textiles, and handmade items.
faq19: How are accommodations selected on Aftrip?
faqtxt19: Accommodations listed on Aftrip are verified and must meet strict quality criteria.
faq20: What are Aftrip’s conditions of use?
faqtxt20: Our terms of use detail your rights and obligations when using our platform, available on our site.
faq21: Can I leave a review on a product or service that I haven't used?
faqtxt21: No, only customers who have made a reservation or purchase can leave a review on Aftrip.
faq22: How can I contact Aftrip customer service?
faqtxt22: You can contact our customer service via live chat or by email.
dearAftrip: At Aftrip, we attach great importance to the privacy and security of our users' personal information. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, store and protect your data when you use our platform. By using Aftrip, you accept the practices described in this policy.
collectInfo1txt: We collect information that you provide directly when using our platform, such as :
infoText1: : When you create an account, we collect information such as your name, email address, phone number, and password.
infoText2: : When you make a booking or purchase, we collect information such as your order details, your payment information, and any other information necessary to process your transaction.
infoText3: : We collect information that you provide when you contact our customer service or otherwise communicate with us.
collectInfoText2: We automatically collect certain information when you use our platform, such as:
autoText1: : We collect information about your interaction with our site, including pages visited, links clicked, and actions taken on the site. : We collect information about your interaction with our site, including pages visited, links clicked, and actions taken on the site.
autoText2: : We collect information about the device you use to access our platform, such as device type, operating system, IP address, and unique device identifiers.
autoText3: : We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your use of our site and to personalize your experience.
useInformationText: We use the information collected for the following purposes:
useInfoTxt1: : Nous utilisons vos informations pour traiter vos réservations, achats, et paiements, et pour vous fournir le service client.
useInfoTxt2: : We use information to personalize your experience on Aftrip, including showing you content and offers tailored to your preferences.
useInfoTxt3: : We analyze data to improve our platform, develop new features, and ensure the security of our services.
useInfoTxt4: : We use your information to send you important notifications about your account, booking confirmations, and updates about our services.
shareInfoText: We only share your personal information in the following cases:
shareTxt1: : We share your information with third parties who provide services on our behalf, such as payment processing, data hosting, and customer support.
shareTxt2: : With your consent, we may share your information with business partners to provide you with additional services or special offers.
shareTxt3: : We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or to respond to legal requests, such as court orders or requests from public authorities.
dataStorageText1: We take reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We use security technologies such as SSL encryption to protect your sensitive data during transmission.
dataStorageText2: Your information is stored on secure servers located in protected data centers. However, no method of transmission or storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
yourChoiceText: You have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:
choiceText1: : You can access and update your personal information through your Aftrip account.
choiceText2: : You can request deletion of your personal information by contacting our customer service.
choiceText3: : You can object to certain processing of your personal information, such as direct marketing.
choiceText4: : You can request a copy of your personal information in a structured and commonly used format.
cookieText: Aftrip uses cookies to improve your experience on our site, personalize content, and analyze our traffic. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.
modifPrivacyText: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated date. We encourage you to periodically review this page to stay informed of any changes.
contactUsText: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy or how we treat your personal information, you can contact us at the customer service email or via live chat

overview.title: Overview
overview.text: This Commission Policy outlines the terms and conditions under which commissions are earned by our partners for accommodations listed on our platform. The policy aims to provide clarity on how commissions are calculated, processed, and paid.

standard_commission_rate.title: 2.1 Standard Commission Rate
standard_commission_rate.text: The standard commission rate for bookings made through our platform is [X%]. This rate applies to the total booking amount excluding taxes and fees.

commission_variations.title: 2.2 Commission Variations
commission_variations.text: Commission rates may vary based on agreements with individual accommodation providers or special promotions. Any such variations will be clearly communicated and documented in the agreement.

booking_confirmation.title: 3.1 Booking Confirmation
booking_confirmation.text: Commissions are calculated based on confirmed bookings. A booking is considered confirmed once the guest has completed the payment and received a confirmation from the accommodation provider.

commissionable_amount.title: 3.2 Commissionable Amount
commissionable_amount.text: The commission is based on the total booking amount, which includes room rates, extra charges, and any additional fees paid by the guest, but excludes taxes.

payment_schedule.title: 4.1 Payment Schedule
payment_schedule.text: Commissions are processed on a [monthly/quarterly] basis. Payments are made within [X] days after the end of the payment period, provided there are no outstanding disputes or issues.

payment_method.title: 4.2 Payment Method
payment_method.text: Payments are made via [bank transfer/paypal/other payment method]. It is the responsibility of the accommodation provider to ensure their payment details are up-to-date.

dispute_submission.title: 5.1 Dispute Submission
dispute_submission.text: If there are any disputes regarding commission payments or calculations, accommodation providers must submit a written dispute within [X] days of receiving the payment.

dispute_resolution_process.title: 5.2 Dispute Resolution Process
dispute_resolution_process.text: All disputes will be reviewed by our team. We will investigate and resolve any issues in a fair and timely manner. The decision on the dispute will be final and binding.

policy_updates.title: Policy Updates
policy_updates.text: This policy may be updated from time to time. Accommodation providers will be notified of any significant changes. Continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.text: As an accommodation manager, you can add, modify, or delete accommodations, manage reservations, and view reviews. Follow the steps below to get started.

steps.title: 1. Create an Account
steps.text: If you don't have an account yet, sign up by providing your establishment's details and your contact information.

steps.title: 2. Add an Accommodation
steps.text: Go to the 'My Accommodations' section to add a new accommodation. Provide details such as the name, address, available room types, and more.

steps.title: 3. Manage Reservations
steps.text: View and manage your reservations by accessing the 'Reservations' section. You can confirm, cancel, or modify bookings based on availability.

managing_accommodations.title: Managing Accommodations
managing_accommodations.text: You can manage all your listed accommodations on the platform. This section helps you understand how to update your accommodation details.

sections.title: Edit an Accommodation
sections.text: To modify accommodation details, go to the 'My Accommodations' section, select the accommodation to edit, and update the necessary information such as pricing, amenities, and availability.

sections.title: Delete an Accommodation
sections.text: If you wish to remove an accommodation from the listing, you can either deactivate or delete it. This action can be reversible or permanent.

reservations_and_commissions.title: Reservations and Commissions
reservations_and_commissions.text: Manage your reservations and make sure you understand how your commissions are calculated.

sections.title: View Reservations
sections.text: All reservations made through the platform are visible in the 'Reservations' section. You can filter reservations by status (confirmed, pending, canceled).

sections.title: Understanding Commissions
sections.text: The platform charges a commission on each confirmed booking. For more details on the commission rate and calculation methods, refer to the commission policy.

support_and_contact.title: Support and Contact
support_and_contact.text: If you encounter any issues or have questions, our support team is available to assist you.

contact_methods.details: Email us at support@yourplatform.com and we will respond within 24 hours.
Use our live chat for immediate assistance during business hours.
Check our FAQ page for answers to common questions.
